title: Why Earnings Season Could Be Great for Ventas (VTR)
text:
Investors are always looking for stocks that are poised to beat at earnings season and Ventas, Inc. VTR may be one such company. The firm has earnings coming up pretty soon, and events are shaping up quite nicely for their report.



That is because Ventas is seeing favorable earnings estimate revision activity as of late, which is generally a precursor to an earnings beat. After all, analysts raising estimates right before earnings — with the most up-to-date information possible — is a pretty good indicator of some favorable trends underneath the surface for VTR in this report.



In fact, the Most Accurate Estimate for the current quarter is currently at 96 cents per share for VTR, compared to a broader Zacks Consensus Estimate of 94 cents per share. This suggests that analysts have very recently bumped up their estimates for VTR, giving the stock a Zacks Earnings ESP of +2.02% heading into earnings season.

Ventas, Inc. Price and EPS Surprise

Ventas, Inc. Price and EPS Surprise More

Ventas, Inc. price-eps-surprise | Ventas, Inc. Quote

Why is this Important?



A positive reading for the Zacks Earnings ESP has proven to be very powerful in producing both positive surprises, and outperforming the market. Our recent 10-year backtest shows that stocks that have a positive Earnings ESP and a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold) or better show a positive surprise nearly 70% of the time, and have returned over 28% on average in annual returns (see more Top Earnings ESP stocks here).



Given that VTR has a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy) and an ESP in positive territory, investors might want to consider this stock ahead of earnings. You can see the complete list of today’s Zacks #1 Rank (Strong Buy) stocks here.



Clearly, recent earnings estimate revisions suggest that good things are ahead for Ventas, and that a beat might be in the cards for the upcoming report.
